text: Allah hee hai jis ne tumhaare liye zameen ko teherne ki jageh aur asmaan ko chath bana diya aur tumhaari surate banaayi aur bahuth acchi banaayi aur tumhe umdah umdah chize khaane ko ata farmaaye, yahi Allah tumhaara parvardigaar hai, pas bahuth hee barkato waala Allah hai, saare jahaan ka parvarish karne waala
